room_title: Escape room "2325 Tremont St." by Escape Cocoa Beach in Melbourne
review: Since there were five of us we attempted the 2325 Tremont Street challenge. We were successful in 41 minutes (with two clues). Would definitely do another escape room challenge in the future.

room_title: Escape room "2325 Tremont St." by Escape Cocoa Beach in Melbourne
review: This was my first time going to an escape room, and i had a blast. I love all things investigative and taking the time to figure out what I need to do in order to solve a ‘life-sized puzzle.’ The man there for us was very welcoming and helpful, accommodating us to let us see how the challenge comes together, or let us struggle on our own depending on our wishes.

room_title: Escape room "2325 Tremont St." by Escape Cocoa Beach in Melbourne
review: Our family (grandparents, parents and kids) had SO much fun at Escape Cocoa Beach. Highly recommend Tremont Street. It took a village but we worked together, solved the mystery, and escaped! It was a great alternative to the beach during our vacation.
